title: Randomly got gifted riot kayle from riot this moring

replies.body: It was the 10 year anniversary for LoL not too long ago and riot were gifting everyone Kayle+RIOT Kayle as a way of saying thanks. If you already owned her you got a mystery gift, haven't got mine yet but i'll be patient. Read up on it here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you
Ya heard about that but i thought it was something else cuz that was like a month ago lel
It takes time for them to get sent out and all that just like most of the other things when they give out icons and mystery gifts so some people are still waiting for theirs like me.
Hi Frommo, it appears you should have received a Mystery Skin because you already owned Riot Kayle. Sorry for the delay, but I've added a Mystery Skin to your account.
You're welcome, glad you like it!
I got the icon but no skin i believe? Did i not play enough or something?
It appears that you got Sandstorm Ekko.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AgEutk2W,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-01T00:55:05.372+0000)
>
> It appears that you got Sandstorm Ekko.

Song Name?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AgEutk2W,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-01T00:55:05.372+0000)
>
> It appears that you got Sandstorm Ekko.

Great thanks :^) perhaps it didnt pop up :^)

So it appears there were some issues that caused some players to not receive their 10 year anniversary gift. We just completed a batch to catch all players who missed out, so that would explain you just receiving your gift yesterday.
Hi I still haven't received mine yet.

You needed to have played a game between ~ July 13 and September 19th, so unfortunately your account was not eligible to receive the gift. There was a period of a week after the announcement that you could earn the gift if you played a game during that time.
Even if you have been playing for the whole ten years since the beta? That's a bit unfair.
Would you know the reason why the Account "Toyota" Is banned?
